item.title: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba Resigns, Hopes Trump Trade Deal Will Be Executed By His Successor
item.description: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba resigns after ruling coalition faces parliamentary losses. Successor to uphold trade deal with Trump. read more
